verses.name: 2 Chronicles 3:7
verses.text: He overlaid also the house, the beams, the posts, and the walls thereof, and the doors thereof, with gold; and graved cherubims on the walls.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 3:8
verses.text: And he made the most holy house, the length whereof was according to the breadth of the house, twenty cubits, and the breadth thereof twenty cubits: and he overlaid it with fine gold, amounting to six hundred talents.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 3:9
verses.text: And the weight of the nails was fifty shekels of gold. And he overlaid the upper chambers with gold.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 3:10
verses.text: And in the most holy house he made two cherubims of image work, and overlaid them with gold.
